subject: Baseball
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Cleveland Indians traded the versatile third baseman Casey Blake and cash to the Los Angeles Dodgers for two minor leaguers. The Indians got catcher Carlos Santana and the right-hander Jonathan Meloan.
snippet: The Cleveland Indians traded the versatile third baseman Casey Blake and cash to the Los Angeles Dodgers for two minor leaguers. The Indians got catcher Carlos Santana and the right-hander Jonathan Meloan.
